text: 6:2 Daniel 7:22; Matyu 19:28; Akar Mogomem 2:26; 3:21; 20:4Ia ti kamaghɨn fozir puvatɨ? E Godɨn gumazamiziba, e nguazimɨn itir biziba bar, da tuisɨgham. Egh ia guizbangɨra gɨn nguazir kamɨn biziba tuisɨghamin fofozim ikiam, egha datɨrɨghɨn manmaghsua osɨmtɨzir muziarir kaba uarir tongɨn ia da tuisɨghamin fofoziba puvatɨ?
